issue.message: Attribute `usesCleartextTraffic` is only used in API level 23 and higher (current min is 21)
A newer version of com.google.android.material:material than 1.9.0 is available: 1.12.0
Permission exists without corresponding hardware `<uses-feature android:name="android.hardware.camera" required="false">` tag
This folder configuration (`v21`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 21. Merge all the resources in this folder into `drawable`.
The resource `R.mipmap.ic_launcher` appears to be unused
Launcher icons should not fill every pixel of their square region; see the design guide for details
